title: Inside Candace Owens’ bond with Charlie Kirk: From best friends to Erika Kirk controversy after his death
summary_full: Candace Owens and Charlie Kirk shared a close friendship that began in 2017 and lasted until Kirk’s death in 2025. After his passing, Owens spoke openly about her grief and later clashed with Kirk’s wife, Erika Kirk. The situation grew more tense after Owens shared a leaked audio, according to Us Weekly.
